channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Insight Core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Insight Core

item.title: CVE-2021-24950|2024-08-03T19:49:13.971Z -- unknown -- insight%20core
item.description: The Insight Core WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not have any authorisation and CSRF checks in the insight_customizer_options_import (available to any authenticated user), does not validate user input before passing it to unserialize(), nor sanitise and escape it before outputting it in the response. As a result, it could allow users with a role as low as Subscriber to perform PHP Object Injection, as well as Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
